commits.message:
[MIO-20] [Staging] Redirect unregistered users trying to log in on FactorForm legacy to Shopify FactorForm (#61299)

* feat: implement two-step login form with email verification and loading state

* feat: add FactorForm login content with two-step login and regular login options

* feat: replace legacy login page with FactorForm login content and add logged out guard

* a11y: add role attribute to LoginOptionsDivider and remove unused router logic from SignupLink

* feat: enhance PasswordlessLoginButton with variant support for FactorForm styling

* a11y: update role attribute in LoginOptionsDivider

* a11y: add aria-hidden attribute to EmailOutline24 in PasswordlessLoginButton for improved accessibility

* feat: wrap TwoStepLoginWithShopifyRedirect in LoggedOutGuard to ensure redirect for logged in users

[TPT-2238]: Show message for mixed breed/size (#61185)

[Cursor_Code]

* [TPT-2238]: Refactor card transition logic into separate hook

[Cursor_Code]

* [TPT-2238]: Improve accessibility and fix type casting in BreedMessageCard

[Cursor_Code]

* fix(TPT-2238): Add 350ms delay for initial BreedMessageCard appearance

Previously, the 350ms transition delay only applied when switching between
existing cards, causing the card to appear immediately on first selection.

Changes:
- Add isInitialAppearance check to detect first-time card display
- Apply 350ms delay consistently for all card appearances
- Update test to wait for delayed card appearance using waitFor

This ensures a smooth, consistent user experience whether the card is
appearing for the first time or transitioning between different breeds.
